


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.dom -->

# ```js stripTags ```


Strip the tags of the passed text

## Parameters

- **html**  String: the html to process



## Example (js)

```js
import stripTags from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/dom/stripTags'
stripTags('<h1>Hello World</h1>') // => Hello World
```
